initiatives.description: Driving the corporate data culture by facilitating knowledge exchange, defining analytics best practices, and accelerating AI adoption across engineering teams.
Promoting corporate values and technological innovation at industry fairs and external events. Selected for exclusive leadership academies to drive brand presence and talent attraction.
Refining executive communication and leadership skills to effectively pitch technical products, run Agile ceremonies, and align senior stakeholders.
Led the strategic integration of ILS departmental data into corporate Big Data initiatives, fostering advanced analytics and cross-functional synergies.
